hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Thursday Green - Somewhere in the forest
hiveArticle.body:
There are some Prohibited Area inside the forest to keep visitors safe. In one of my forest visit in South India, I have seen one of those Prohibited Area, though I am not very sure is it because of the Wild Animals or anything else. There are no one to clear the doubts too. 

![_DSC0337.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTBdycrQPHxBziWzG1SPzwYzJ4KR7pmRHprSUyLSTVWmJ/_DSC0337.jpg)
